information.aboutme: Hello, my name is Tantai Layluxsiri, a graduate of Chulalongkorn universityâ€™s International School of Engineering (ISE) majoring in information and communication engineering (ICE). My main experiences are android programming, and some web and game programming. I usually did android programming in android studio with either Java or Kotlin.
